snippet.title: Soul Devourer Demo on Steam Now
snippet.description:
You can wishlist now on Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2530620?utm_source=youtube

Soul Devourer is a 2D metroidvania action-platformer still in development, and we plan to release the game in mid~late 2024.

You can also follow our twitter for the latest updates on the game!
https://twitter.com/WaterBearGaming

The game can be also downloaded from:
itch.io: https://studiowaterbear.itch.io/souldevourer
